tool_description: Create QR Code with logo free
name: QR Code
title: QR Code

api_list.name: Converttostring
api_list.description: Converts a logo image to a base64 string.

api_list.name: GenerateQRCode
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code8.p.rapidapi.com/qrcode/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code8.p.rapidapi.com/qrcode/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code8.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
